channel.title: Database on Guanghua Mao's website

item.title: Database Management Essentials
item.description: 1. Database System Good decisions require good information derived from raw facts. Users can manage data efficiently when it is stored in database in term of size, security, accuracy, ease of updating and redundance. Databases are shared, integrated computer structure that stores a collection of data. End-user data: raw facts of interest to the end user Metadata: data about data, description of data characteristics and relationships in data
